aboutFact.title: Who We Are
aboutFact.subtitle: FACT Center for Strategic Studies – Vision for Thinking, Solutions for the Future
aboutFact.description: Established in early 2025 in London under the leadership of former Jordanian Minister Wajih Azaizeh, FACT brings together an elite group of researchers and experts. It focuses on strategic issues related to asylum and displacement, particularly the Palestinian refugee issue and UNRWA. The center conducts in-depth research on international conflicts and crises, with special attention to the Arab-Israeli conflict, the legal and human rights dimensions of the refugee crisis, and strategies for conflict resolution and peacebuilding.

about.title: FACT Center for Strategic Studies
about.paragraph1: It is an independent research institution founded in London in early 2025, headed by former Jordanian Minister Wajih Azaizeh, and includes a select group of researchers and experts in refugee issues and international conflicts.
about.paragraph2: The center aims to provide a deep understanding of regional and international challenges, and to produce scientific knowledge that contributes to formulating realistic policies and future solutions.
about.paragraph3: FACT focuses on strategic issues related to asylum and displacement, with special attention to the Palestinian refugee issue and the role of UNRWA, in addition to studying international conflicts, regional security trends, and the legal and human rights dimensions of humanitarian crises.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading intellectual platform in the region and the world, providing a vision for thinking... and solutions for the future, and contributing to building sustainable peace based on a deep understanding of the roots of crises and their complexities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At FACT, we strive to provide reliable studies and in-depth analyses that help decision-makers and international institutions adopt well-considered policies based on data and scientific research, while promoting human justice and protecting the rights of refugees.

about.title: About the Department
about.paragraph1: The FACT Center for Strategic Studies provides a wide range of specialized research and studies addressing issues of asylum and displacement, regional and international conflicts, and geopolitical transformations. The Center relies on advanced research methodologies and a network of experts who analyze events and develop evidence-based insights, future visions, and policy recommendations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading intellectual platform in the region and the world, offering innovative thinking and sustainable solutions for the future, while contributing to building lasting peace grounded in a deep understanding of the root causes and complexities of crises.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At FACT, we strive to provide reliable studies and in-depth analyses that assist decision-makers and international institutions in adopting well-informed, data-driven policies. We are committed to promoting humanitarian justice and protecting the rights of refugees.
